definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Emperor moths live in temperate forests.
Temperate rain forests get much of their water from moisture-laden ocean winds.
sentences.chinese: 温带雨林得到很多的它们的雨水从含水分的海洋风。

sentences.english: Is a warm sub-humid continental climate.
sentences.chinese: 属暖温带半湿润大陆性气候。

sentences.english: Influenza epidemics occur yearly during autumn and winter in temperate regions.
sentences.chinese: 在温带地区的秋季和冬季期间，每年发生流感流行。

sentences.english: There are abundant wild aromatic plant resources in Changbai Mountains, where the climate is temperate.
sentences.chinese: 长白山区属温带气候，野生芳香植物资源十分丰富。

sentences.english: China stretches across vast area covering the cold, temperate and tropical zones.
sentences.chinese: 中国幅员辽阔，包括了寒带，温带和热带。

sentences.english: There is abundant wild pestkilling plant resources in Changbai Mountains, where the climate is temperate.
sentences.chinese: 长白山区属温带气候，野生杀虫植物资源十分丰富。

sentences.english: B: It looks best in spring, when the plum and cherry blossoms are out.
sentences.chinese: 温带核果植物像樱桃，桃子和李子也有受冻的危险。

sentences.english: Some icebergs, however, drift north to warmer climates and disintegrate.
sentences.chinese: 不过，也有一些冰山会往北漂流到温带然后消融。

sentences.english: SONGDA finally turned into an extratropical cyclone as it reached the southern coast of Honshu, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 桑达最后在到达日本本州南部时演变为温带气旋。

sentences.english: Temperate-zone fruit trees have brought prosperity to many aborigines .
sentences.chinese: 温带果树富裕了山地居民的生活。

sentences.english: Lying within the South Temperate Zone, New Zealand has an oceanic climate, without extremes of heat or cold.
sentences.chinese: 新西兰地处南温带，属海洋性气候，没有严冬和酷署。

sentences.english: North Temperate species in the communities are main distribution type in these communities.
sentences.chinese: 群落中以北温带分布的植物为主。

sentences.english: This fruit is characteristic mainly to the temperate parts of Europe.
sentences.chinese: 欧楂果是欧洲温带地区的特色水果。

sentences.english: Both holly and ivy grow abundantly in temperate climates.
sentences.chinese: 这两个冬青树和常春藤在生长十分温带气候。

sentences.english: Henan has a temperate continental climate, with most rainfall in summer.
sentences.chinese: 河南省属于温带大陆性气候，夏季多雨。
